name: Guardian Mog
effects: Cure all status effects after battle
Increase resistance to all status effects by 25%

name: Guardian Mog
莫古的護身符
모그의 부적
Amulette Mog
Mogus Amulett
Poder de Mogu
desc_short: Boost resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone, and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone after battle
提高異常狀態耐性+結束戰鬥時治療異常狀態
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승+전투 종료 시 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복
Augmente la rés. à poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala., et pétri., et soigne poi., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri. après le combat
Erhöht Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein und heilt Heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein nach dem Kampf.
Aumenta la res. al ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie, y cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie al terminar el combate
desc_long: Boosts poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance, and cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone after battle.
提高異常狀態耐性，結束戰鬥時治療異常狀態。
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승하고, 전투 종료 시 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복합니다.

Augmente la résistance à poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie, et pétrification, et soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification après le combat.
Erhöht Resist. gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein und heilt Heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein nach dem Kampf.

Aumenta la resistencia al veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra, y cura veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra al terminar el combate.
